title: Patronage of the arts Ren. rulers vs fascists

content.question:
Directions: In writing your essays, use specific examples to support your answer. The suggested writing time for this question is 30 minutes. You are advised to spend 5 minutes planning your answer in the area below.
Compare and contrast the patronage of the arts by Italian Renaissance rulers with that by dictators of the 1930's.

skill.text: Skill 4.A: Identify and describe a historical context for a specific historical development or process.
